dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1951
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Writes of visits to hospitals and conscientious objectors suffering in prison. Recalls "that to love means to suffer, and who would be without love."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 233 1951-05-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
